name: Elite Army Sniper Shooter 3d - spy shooting missions: fully free game
name_original: Elite Army Sniper Shooter 3d - spy shooting missions: fully free game
description:
You are one of our main sniper shooter and in this war of sniper shooting you have to prove this by sniper kill and sniper attack the enemies military commandos. we are left with no choice but to kill main enemies officers busy in these border areas hills . for this you are the best sniper 3d choice for us. So be ready sniper shooter to shoot sniper 3d enemies. Remember , enemies are heavily guarded. So always after first sniper shot you have shot , shot and shoot until all of their soldier are dead .

Main Features:
=> modern 3d sniper weapons
=> real sniper shooting simulation with nice touch control
=> real 3d front line border graphics and different regions to play with
=> amazing 3d sounds
=> real bullets effects
=> Lots of missions and airstrike , health kit and armor help
